My First F-Droid Archive Demo

These are the apps that have been archived from the main repo.

Currently it serves 15 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xrz-cloud/Download2MyFrdoid/main/fdroid/archive

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
D3 2D 7A 89 AC C5 CF CE E9 67 B1 10 AD B7 06 AD 1E A2 40 BB D6 88 E9 86 A8 FD 72 6F 0F BC DD 42
